context_bundle.summary: Rust-based MCP server for high-performance text searching, filtering, and replacement. 12 tools: grep, grep_context, grep_count, grep_files, extract_matches, extract_lines, file_stats, compare_files, find_duplicates, replace (preview), replace_confirm, filter_lines.

onboarding.quick_start: EXE: X:/mcp-servers/textgrep-mcp-rs/target/release/textgrep-mcp-rs.exe. Key tools: grep (pattern search with regex), grep_context (N lines around matches), replace (safe 2-step with preview+confirm). Use filter_lines for complex multi-condition filtering.
common_patterns: replace preview then confirm with token
filter_lines with contains + not_contains for complex filters
known_errors: Replace requires preview first (returns token), then confirm
Large file operations may timeout - use file_stats first to check sizes
